sameAnalysis.part_name: 这些名词都含有"客人，访问者"之意。
means: guest ： 多指事先受到激请而来，并受到欢迎与招待的宾客。也可指付钱居住者。
visitor ： 普通用词，指出差、访问、旅游、参观或到旅馆投宿的人。
passenger ： 主要指乘坐交通工具的游人或旅客。
customer ： 主要指交易一方的买主、主顾。
client与customer同义，多指进入商店被店员接待或购物的人。

sentence.Network_en: She has become a regular visitor to Houghton Hall.
sentence.Network_cn: 她已经成了霍顿府的常客。

sentence.Network_en: The Visitor Centre is open daily 8.30 a.m. – 4.30 p.m.
sentence.Network_cn: 游客中心每日上午8：30至下午4：30开放。

sentence.Network_en: Seen from afar, its towering buildings beckon the visitor in.
sentence.Network_cn: 从远处看，它高耸的大楼召唤着拜访者进去。

means.word_mean: 访问者,旅游者,客人,常客

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English: from Anglo-Norman French visitour, from Old French visiter (see visit)

entry.def: A visitor is someone who is visiting a person or place.

example.ex: The other day we had some visitors from Switzerland...
example.tran: 前几天我们接待了几位来自瑞士的参观者。

example.ex: As a student I lived in Oxford but was a frequent visitor to Belfast.
example.tran: 求学时我住在牛津，但常常去贝尔法斯特。

auth_sentence.content: The charming visitor...began to chatter with her usual volubility.
auth_sentence.res_content: The charming visitor...began to chatter with her usual volubility.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: The charming visitor...began to chatter with her usual volubility.

auth_sentence.content: Check with your health visitor if you are unsure.
auth_sentence.res_content: Check with your health visitor if you are unsure.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Check with your health visitor if you are unsure.

auth_sentence.content: Your health visitor or health centre can supply them.
auth_sentence.res_content: Your health visitor or health centre can supply them.
auth_sentence.res_content_con: Your health visitor or health centre can supply them.

stems_affixes.word_buile: di分开+vis分开+ible能……的→adj.可分的
advise建议+able能……的→adj.可取的, 明智的
advise[v.忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知]+ory……的→adj.劝告的
provision预备+al……的→预备的,临时的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 看得见的, 明显的, 显著的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vis看,查+ible能……的→adj.看得见的, 明显的, 显著的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 有远见的,有洞察力的;空想的
stems_affixes.word_buile: vision[n.视力,视觉;远见;洞察力;幻想,幻影;想象力]+ary……的→adj.有远见的,有洞察力的;空想的
vis看,查+ual……的→adj.看的,看得见的;视觉的

stems_affixes.value_cn: 装置, 设计, 图案, 策略, 发明物, 设备
stems_affixes.word_buile: de分开+vice=vis分开→分离出→想出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 分,分割;部门,科,处;除法;分界线
stems_affixes.word_buile: di分开+vis分开+ion表名词→n.分,分割;部门,科,处;除法;分界线
advise[v.忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知]→ n.忠告,建议;告知
advise建议+or人→advisor顾问

stems_affixes.value_cn: 供应,[一批]供应品;预备;条款;[
stems_affixes.word_buile: pro前,提前+vis看,查+ion表名词→供应;预备
revise[v.修订,校订;修正,修改]+ion表名词→n.修改,修订

stems_affixes.value_cn: 监考人,管理人,检查员,主管人,[计]超级用户
stems_affixes.word_buile: supervise[v.临视]+or人等→n.监考人,管理人,检查员,主管人,[计]超级用户
vis看,查+a→看过了的,查过了的→允许入境

stems_affixes.value_cn: 视力,视觉;远见;洞察力;幻想,幻影;想象力
stems_affixes.word_buile: vis看,查+ion表名词→n.视力,视觉;远见;洞察力;幻想,幻影;想象力

stems_affixes.value_cn: 访问者, 来宾, 游客
stems_affixes.word_buile: visit[n.&v.拜访, 访问, 游览, 参观]+or人→n.访问者, 来宾, 游客

stems_affixes.value_cn: 拜访, 访问, 游览, 参观
stems_affixes.word_buile: vis看,查+it走→边走边看→游览

stems_affixes.value_cn: 设计;发明;图谋;作出[计划];想出[办法]
stems_affixes.word_buile: de分开+vis分开+e→分离出→想出

stems_affixes.value_cn: 忠告,劝告,建议;通知,告知
stems_affixes.word_buile: ad=according+vis看,查+e→根据查看而提出
pre预先+vis看,查+e→v.预知,预先警告
re再+vis看,查+e→再看→修正
vis看,查+a→看过了的,查过了的→允许入境
visual[adj.看的,看得见的;视觉的]+ize表动词→v.想象
super在上面+vis看+e→在上面看→临视

Sentence.sentence: But in recent years the capital's culinary (烹饪的) scene has developed to the point that it is now confident of its ability to please the tastes of any international visitor.

While Gail Obcamp, an American artist was giving a speech on the art of Japanese brush painting to an audience that included visitors from Japan, she was confused to see that many of her Japanese listeners have their eyes closed.
Tom, one of the things visitor notices about Harrogate is the large area of open park land right down into the middle of the town.
How to cope with the huge crowds of visitors to the municipal building

While Gail Obcamp, an American artist was giving a speech on the art of Japanese brush painting to an audience that included visitors from Japan, she was confused to see that many of her Japanese listeners have their eyes closed.

sentences.en: There was such a crowd round the distinguished visitor that I could not get to speak to him.
sentences.cn: 那么多的人围着这位尊贵的来访者, 以致我无法同他说话。

sentences.en: London is full of visitors during May and June.
sentences.cn: 五六月间伦敦挤满了游客。

sentences.en: These winter visitors will fly to British shores.
sentences.cn: 这些冬季的候鸟将飞向英国的海岸。

jushi.english: We've had several visitors staying with us at different times this summer.
jushi.chinese: 今年夏天,在不同时间有几位客人住在我家里。

jushi.english: We had several visitors yesterday afternoon.
jushi.chinese: 昨天下午我们这里来了几位客人。

jushi.english: She greeted the visitor cordially, inviting her to stay for breakfast.
jushi.chinese: 她亲切地招呼着客人,请她留下来吃早饭。
